name: Austin ISD - Camp Heatwave (Third Base)
notes: Day camp 7am-6pm with themes, field trips, enrichment activities, and swim days on most weeks. All elementary students welcome.
dates: May 28 - August 8, 2026. Weekly sessions and some 3-day weeks available.
location: Clayton ES, Galindo ES, Hill ES

name: Austin ISD - Multilingual Summer School (Pre-K4 & Kindergarten)
notes: Language development enrichment camp for emergent bilingual students. Prepares students for kindergarten and first grade. Bus transportation available for eligible students.
registrationDate: March 3 - March 28, 2026. Electronic or paper forms available from homeroom teachers.
location: North: TA Brown Elementary (7801 Guadalupe St, 78752), Govalle Elementary (3601 Govalle Ave, 78702). South: Kocurek Elementary (9800 Curlew Dr, 78748), Uphaus Early Childhood Center (5200 Freidrich Ln, 78744)

name: Austin ISD - Future Ready Summer Camp (Middle School)
notes: Accelerates students' English and literacy skills through Science, Math, and Reading while engaging in exciting projects. For emergent bilingual students in middle school.
registrationDate: Registration begins March 3, 2026. Electronic and paper forms available from teachers.
location: North: Garcia YMLA (7414 Johnny Morris Rd, 78724). South: Covington Middle School (3700 Convict Hill Rd, 78749)

name: Austin ISD - High School Summer School Programs
notes: Includes Dual Language programs, EOC prep, Newcomer programs, ACE, and Summer Melt programs. Various programs for high school students.
dates: Various: June 2 - July 11, 2026; June 9-26, etc. (varies by program)
registrationDate: Check website for specific registration dates
location: Multiple locations including Navarro, Travis, Eastside high schools

name: Round Rock ISD - Summer Camps
notes: Round Rock Independent School District summer camp programs. Check website for specific program details, dates, and registration information.
